project_abstract.cdata: The project comprises: (i) A 1,000 tons per day (TPD) urea plant as an addition to an existing fertilizer complex at Bajio, near Salamanca, in the State of Guanajuato; (ii) A 1,500 TPD urea plant at Coatzacoalcos in the State of Veracruz; (iii) Expansion of an existing parathion (insecticide) plant in Salamanca, in the State of Guanajuato, by adding an additional production capacity of 10 TPD.
